entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 8:19 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
